Topic.Title: Delete game from Quest or ActiveLit

Posts.EditableText:
Does anyone know how to delete a game from Quest or ActiveLit? I created a game to learn, now i would like to delete and startover. I can't find a way to delete the game beside delete all objects, probably i am missing something.

Thank you
Posts.HTML:
Does anyone know how to delete a game from Quest or ActiveLit? I created a game to learn, now i would like to delete and startover. I can't find a way to delete the game beside delete all objects, probably i am missing something.

Thank you

Posts.EditableText: The only way is requesting it via [the contact form](http://textadventures.co.uk/help/contact).
Posts.HTML: The only way is requesting it via the contact form.

Posts.EditableText: I've never quite understood why we don't have the option to do so ourselves. I have dozens upon dozens of 'test' games uploaded and I sometimes fear I'll have exceeded my limit by the time I want to upload a proper game.
Posts.HTML: I've never quite understood why we don't have the option to do so ourselves. I have dozens upon dozens of 'test' games uploaded and I sometimes fear I'll have exceeded my limit by the time I want to upload a proper game.

Posts.EditableText: Thank you, actually for ActiveLit i found that deleting the user and creating again will wipe also games therefore may be a way to get around it.
Posts.HTML: Thank you, actually for ActiveLit i found that deleting the user and creating again will wipe also games therefore may be a way to get around it.
